original_text: So all Israel was recorded in genealogies, and these are written in the Book of the Kings of Israel. And Judah was taken into exile in Babylon because of their breach of faith.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘이 그 계보대로 계수되어 그들은 이스라엘 왕조실록에 기록되니라 유다가 범죄함으로 말미암아 바벨론으로 사로잡혀 갔더니

sentences.original_text: So all Israel was recorded in genealogies
and these are written in the Book of the Kings of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들은 이스라엘 왕들의 책에 기록되어 있습니다

sentences.original_text: And Judah was taken into exile in Babylon
because of their breach of faith
